title: 菊花賞の後に・勝者となり、次の憧れへ

text_block_list.text: Matikanetannhauser wins brilliantly! The audience was astonished, but many voices praised her diligent side.
Meanwhile, on the underground path, Mihono Bourbon and Rice Shower are seen. The two praise each other and promise a rematch in the senior class.
After returning home, at Matikanetannhauser's suggestion, they set their next major goal as the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' while—
It was decided to include one long-distance race before spring, so the next target race is set as the 'Diamond Stakes'!
